title: 宝塚記念の後に・世界の強豪へ！

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Wow, that was a great race to watch! McQueen was good too.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Actually, Matikanetannhauser, compared to her classic-year days, it's like her aura or something has changed, hasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Reporter with Round Glasses
text_block_list.text: ...Tannhauser-san, as always, she's growing while looking forward.

text_block_list.name: Reporter with Round Glasses
text_block_list.text: Alright, I need to work hard too...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm back!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, thank you! But, I still have a long way to go, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There are so many things I can do, and I want to keep working hard for the next one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, about the next race... I'd like to do the 'Japan Cup'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a rare domestic race where you can face off against top-class competitors from around the world! Glittering and intense!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I-I don't exactly have confidence that I can win, but...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But hey, I still want to give it a shot!
With that said, the next race was decided without hesitation: the 'Japan Cup'!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser-san! Thank you for today.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, McQueen! Thank you too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We raced together in the Tenno Sho (Spring) as well, but this time I felt even more growth from you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Really!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes. We haven't raced together many times, but still—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You've become several times more of a formidable opponent than I remember from school or other races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And I felt that clearly in today's 'Takarazuka Kinen' as well.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see, hehe. That makes me happy.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I was watching you too, McQueen, working hard!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You were shining so brightly, working hard like that. It gave me courage!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Is that so? Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We might bump into each other somewhere again in the future.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: When that time comes, let's do our best together again.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, same here!
Her next target race is the 'Japan Cup'—I want her to aim for further growth and charge ahead!
